notes.title: WEEK 1
notes.content:

notes.title: WEEK 4
notes.content:
ğŸ“š Week 4: Recovering a Sense of Integrity

Focus:

Realigning with your truth by clearing out distractions, becoming more honest with yourself, and listening deeply to what your inner artist actually needsâ€”without numbing, avoiding, or overconsuming.

ğŸ›‘ Reading deprivation = clarity, not punishment
ğŸ§˜â€â™€ï¸ Distraction is often disguised avoidance

notes.title: WEEK 5
notes.content:
ğŸ“š Week 5: Recovering a Sense of Possibility

notes.title: WEEK 6
notes.content:
ğŸ“š Week 6: Recovering a Sense of Abundance

Focus:

Shifting from scarcity to sufficiency by examining your beliefs around money, worth, and creative value. This week helps you notice where you limit yourselfâ€”and start inviting more support, joy, and overflow into your life.

âœ¨ Core Chapter Themes

ğŸ’¸ Scarcity mindset restricts creativity
ğŸ§  Money stories are often inherited and untrue
ğŸ’› Treating yourself with care builds belief
ğŸ Abundance is a mindset, not a number

ğŸ“‹ Weekly Tasks (pick your favs)

ğŸ“œ Write your money storyâ€”what you were taught, what you believe
ğŸ§  List your top 5 scarcity thoughts (then reframe them)
ğŸ’° Track how you spend and where you withhold (especially from yourself)
ğŸ Buy yourself one small, meaningful creative treat
ğŸ§º Declutter and donate somethingâ€”create flow
ğŸ“¸ Create a â€œrich lifeâ€ moodboard (what abundance feels like for you)
âœï¸ Journal: What would I create if you felt totally supported?
ğŸ” Practice 3 daily affirmations about money, joy, or ease
ğŸ›ï¸ Notice what feels luxurious and nourishingâ€”not performative
ğŸŒ· Plan a low-cost Artist Date that feels decadent

âœï¸ Reflection Prompts
